basic.description: Within a team structure involving second, third, and fourth year Civil Engineering students and a faculty advisor, students will engage in a range of exercises designed to promote written and verbal communication, decision making, team building and engineering design skills. Lectures, workshops, design charettes and both individual and team assignments will be utilized to enhance learning.
basic.subject: CIVL
basic.title: Civil Week-Professional Skills

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of CIVL200 and registered in a BSCE Academic Program.
